title: Cognizant CFO Jatin Dalal sees positive signals in IT demand scenario after long
description: Speaking about the recent controversy on low salary at the entry levels, Dalal said that it was a “misunderstanding” and for engineers the company pays salaries in the range of “Rs. 4 lakh going up to Rs. 12 lakh” for different types of work and colleges. “This Rs. 2.5 lakh salary, I want to put it on record, is not reflective of an engineer's salary. That is for a three year undergraduate course at an entry level…. So these are two very different parallel streams of hiring.”
content: US-headquartered Cognizant Technology Services is seeing some sense of “positivity” returning to the demand environment for technology services after several quarters of slowdown in spending, said chief financial officer Jatin Dalal.
